channel.title: Core on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Core on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: develop
item.description: Known bugs (34 campaigns / 42 issues) tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/06_statistics.ts : PrestaShop#37520 : Stats > Newsletter : Uncaught TypeError: e is undefined PrestaShop#37521 : Stats > Sales and orders : Uncaught TypeError: e is undefined tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_checkEndpoints.ts : PrestaShop#38784 : Delete / list / tests discounts PrestaShop#38647 : GET & POST endpoints for each type tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/03_hook/01_putHookStatusId.ts : PrestaShop#34507 : API : Endpoint PUT /api/hook-status - Issues Doc Swagger & Enpoint format tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/03_hook/02_getHooks.ts : PrestaShop#35616 : Endpoint /api/hooks & List of Hooks : Incorrect count of hooks tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/06_product/08_patchProductId.

item.title: 9.0.x

item.title: 8.2.x
item.description: Known bugs (10 campaigns / 9 issues) tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/01_clientCredentialGrantFlow/01_internalAuthServer/02_resourceEndpoint.ts : PrestaShop#29813 : APIS10 - Create an App object in the BO to manage API accesses of external applications tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/01_clientCredentialGrantFlow/02_externalAuthServer/01_authorizationEndpoint.ts : Remove it when Puppeteer will accept self signed certificates tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/01_clientCredentialGrantFlow/02_externalAuthServer/02_resourceEndpoint.ts : Remove it when Puppeteer will accept self signed certificates tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/02_orders/01_orders/viewAndEditOrder/11_checkInvoice.ts : PrestaShop#22581 : INVOICE - MAIL / No shop logo on the invoice when you change the port (Docker) tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/08_design/06_imageSettings/11_imageGenerationOnCreation.

item.title: 1.7.8.x
